UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and optimization of an antimicrobial peptide from the ant venom toxin pilosulin.
Literature.Author: Zelezetsky I, Pag U, Antcheva N, Sahl HG, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:100% Hemolysis=100 µM
